Text: So is this the full 36 episodes?

Oh, sorry I thought this was the original series. Thankfully, I found a great torrent with all the Macross series, mostly in Japanese with English subs, which lets choose which series you want to download: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5809156/Macross_Uber_Collection_Complete_-_Jap_with_Eng_Sub_50gb
